Fruteacorp - bu faqat choy mahsulotlarin: Fruteacorp is an online store specializing in tea products. Through our website, you can order a variety of high-quality tea products and enjoy home delivery services.
2. Mahsulotlarni qayerdan sotib olsam bo: 2. Where can I purchase the products?
Fruteacorp mahsulotlari faqat bizning ra: Fruteacorp products are exclusively available on our official website. We only accept online orders and do not have physical stores.
3. Yetkazib berish xizmati qanday ishlay: 3. How does the delivery service work?
Toshkent shahri ichidagi yetkazib berish: Delivery within Tashkent city is free. For other regions, delivery is carried out through the Uzbekistan postal service, and this service is paid.
4. Buyurtma qancha vaqtda yetkazib beril: 4. How long does it take to deliver an order?
Toshkent shahri ichidagi buyurtmalar oda: Orders within Tashkent city are usually delivered within 2-3 business days. Delivery times to other regions may vary depending on the postal service.
5. Boshqa viloyatlarga yetkazib berish n: 5. What is the delivery cost to other regions?
Toshkentdan tashqaridagi viloyatlarga po: Delivery to regions outside Tashkent is paid, and the cost depends on the postal service. Detailed information about delivery costs will be provided when you place an order.
Biz faqat Payme va Click orqali to'lovla: We only accept payments through Payme and Click. You can choose one of these systems when making a payment.
7. Mahsulotni qanday kuzatishim mumkin?: 7. How can I track my order?
Buyurtmangizni kuzatish uchun sizga buyu: To track your order, you will be provided with an order number and a tracking number. You can find this information in the 'My Orders' section of your account.
8. Buyurtmam yetkazilmagan bo'lsa, nima: 8. What should I do if my order is not delivered?
Agar buyurtmangiz belgilangan muddatda y: If your order is not delivered within the specified time, please contact our customer support service. We will assist you in tracking the delivery process.
9. Buyurtmani qanday qilib qaytarish mum: 9. How can I return an order?
Agar mahsulot yetkazib berilganda nuqson: If the product is defective or incorrect upon delivery, you can contact our customer support service for a return. We will provide you with the return conditions and instructions.
10. Qo'shimcha savollarim bo'lsa, qanday: 10. How can I contact you for additional questions?
Bizning mijozlarni qo'llab-quvvatlash xi: You can contact our customer support service by phone. You can also send questions via email.
